name: Raoul Pal The Journey Man
title: Beeple RETURNS:  AI, NFTs & the Rise of Memetics
text:
Synopsis
Raoul Pal predicts a potential economic Singularity by 2030, suggesting a critical six-year window for strategic preparation and adaptation to significant economic transformations.

Key Insights
- Raoul Pal anticipates a major economic shift occurring around 2030
- He suggests there are approximately six years to "unfuck our future"
- Pal has created a preparatory report titled "Prepare for 2030"
- The report aims to help individuals secure their economic position beyond 2030
